## glab mr issues

Get issues related to a particular merge request.

### Synopsis

Get issues related to a particular merge request.

```
glab mr issues <id> [flags]
```

### Examples

```
$ glab mr issues 46
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for issues
```
